mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(user_id, b_title, b_category, b_content, b_lang, b_comment_active) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{b_title}, #{b_category}, #{b_content}, #{b_lang}, #{b_comment_active})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE b_category = COALESCE(#{category}, b_category)
SELECT * FROM board WHERE b_category = COALESCE(#{category}, b_category) AND b_delete = 0 ORDER BY b_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 20
SELECT * FROM board WHERE user_id = #{username} AND b_delete = 0

SELECT * FROM board WHERE b_no LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b_content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR user_id LIKE concat('%' #{keyword}, '%') AND b_delete = 0 ORDER BY b_no ASC LIMIT #{offset}, 20
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET b_title = #{boardDTO.b_title}, b_category = #{boardDTO.b_category}, b_content = #{boardDTO.b_content}, b_lang = #{boardDTO.b_lang}, b_comment_active = #{boardDTO.b_comment_active} WHERE b_no = #{pageNum}
